name: HyperX Cloud II Gaming Headset
description: Comfortable gaming headset with 7.1 virtual surround sound, noise-canceling mic, and memory foam ear cushions.

name: Asus TUF Gaming Monitor
description: 27-inch Asus TUF gaming monitor with 165Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and FreeSync support.

name: Logitech G502 Lightspeed Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Wireless gaming mouse with HERO 25K sensor, customizable RGB lighting, and 11 programmable buttons.

name: Acer Predator Helios 300 Gaming Laptop
description: Acer Predator Helios 300 with Intel Core i7, RTX 3060, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD for high-performance gaming.

name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro
description: iPhone 14 Pro with 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip, and 48MP Pro camera system.

name: Microsoft Xbox Series X
description: Xbox Series X with 1TB SSD, 4K gaming at up to 120FPS, and backward compatibility with previous Xbox games.
